layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x116
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x116
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x100
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 600x100 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 598x98
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 598x94
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 296x94 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 292x89
                text run at (2,2) width 292: "Cell text should be justified which means"
                text run at (2,20) width 114: "that the right and "
                text run at (115,20) width 179: "left margins should line up,"
                text run at (2,38) width 292: "no matter how long the content becomes"
                text run at (2,56) width 292: "(except the last line which should be left"
                text run at (2,74) width 57: "aligned)."
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (300,2) size 296x94 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 292x89
                text run at (2,2) width 292: "Cell text should be justified which means"
                text run at (2,20) width 114: "that the right and "
                text run at (115,20) width 179: "left margins should line up,"
                text run at (2,38) width 292: "no matter how long the content becomes"
                text run at (2,56) width 292: "(except the last line which should be left"
                text run at (2,74) width 57: "aligned)."
